content: 4/5 Non-Expired/Universal codes didn't work. But the last, providing three gold keys did so...I guess that's something? I haven't found any chests yet so not a major disappointment but I guess I shouldn't have jumped right into paying for the Pro version of this app until I tested the free version. Oh well. Also, for the dev's information (not sure if it matters) I am playing Borderlands 3 on Stadia.
replyContent: The codes may only be redeemed once. If you have already redeemed any of these codes before using this app you will not be able to redeem them again. (See the error messages section in the user guide). The chest where you can redeem these keys is located on Sanctuary. You'll see it on your right on your way to Marcus and the vending machines.
